product.title: Remington Shine Therapy 2" Flat Iron
product.description: Rejuvenate your hair while you style and create a look that radiates shine and confidence with Remington® Shine Therapy™. The Remington Shine Therapy™ 2” Flat Iron delivers shine-enhancing results for up to 50 percent shinier*** and 68 percent smoother**** hair. The Advanced Ceramic plates are infused with a micro-conditioner, antioxidant-rich Argan oil, and protein-rich Keratin. As you style your hair, the infused plates transfer the micro-conditioner onto the hair to reduce frizz for smooth, radiant shine. Use the Remington Shine Therapy™ 2” Flat Iron with the full suite of Remington Shine Therapy™ products to achieve your favorite look.
product.description_html: Rejuvenate your hair while you style and create a look that radiates shine and confidence with Remington® Shine Therapy™. The Remington Shine Therapy™ 2” Flat Iron delivers shine-enhancing results for up to 50 percent shinier*** and 68 percent smoother**** hair. The Advanced Ceramic plates are infused with a micro-conditioner, antioxidant-rich Argan oil, and protein-rich Keratin. As you style your hair, the infused plates transfer the micro-conditioner onto the hair to reduce frizz for smooth, radiant shine.  Use the Remington Shine Therapy™ 2” Flat Iron with the full suite of Remington Shine Therapy™ products to achieve your favorite look.
product.description_full:
Rejuvenate your hair while you style and create a look that radiates shine and confidence with Remington® Shine Therapy™. The Remington Shine Therapy™ 2” Flat Iron delivers shine-enhancing results for up to 50 percent shinier*** and 68 percent smoother**** hair. The Advanced Ceramic plates are infused with a micro-conditioner, antioxidant-rich Argan oil, and protein-rich Keratin. As you style your hair, the infused plates transfer the micro-conditioner onto the hair to reduce frizz for smooth, radiant shine. Use the Remington Shine Therapy™ 2” Flat Iron with the full suite of Remington Shine Therapy™ products to achieve your favorite look. * Remington Shine Therapy 2" Flat Iron
 * Advanced Ceramic Plates, 9X more cerami* for even consistent heat, infused with antioxidant-rich Argan oil, protein-rich Keratin, and a micro-conditioner.
 * 2x Shine-Enhancing Technology the micro-conditioner releases onto the hair as you style to reduce frizz for smooth, radiant shine.
 * 2” Wide Flat Iron features floating plates for a smooth glide.
product.description_full_html:
Rejuvenate your hair while you style and create a look that radiates shine and confidence with Remington® Shine Therapy™. The Remington Shine Therapy™ 2” Flat Iron delivers shine-enhancing results for up to 50 percent shinier*** and 68 percent smoother**** hair. The Advanced Ceramic plates are infused with a micro-conditioner, antioxidant-rich Argan oil, and protein-rich Keratin. As you style your hair, the infused plates transfer the micro-conditioner onto the hair to reduce frizz for smooth, radiant shine. Use the Remington Shine Therapy™ 2” Flat Iron with the full suite of Remington Shine Therapy™ products to achieve your favorite look.
  • Remington Shine Therapy 2" Flat Iron
  • Advanced Ceramic Plates, 9X more cerami* for even consistent heat, infused with antioxidant-rich Argan oil, protein-rich Keratin, and a micro-conditioner.
  • 2x Shine-Enhancing Technology the micro-conditioner releases onto the hair as you style to reduce frizz for smooth, radiant shine.
  • 2” Wide Flat Iron features floating plates for a smooth glide.

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 3-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
